First post

Posted on December 30, 2014 by Jens

This is my first blogpost. I’m just editing an example file that came included in the Cactus theme Posts directory. Hopefully I will have this page in shape by the end of the week end. The plan is to start logging my different projects in this site. Everything from code, electronics, art, photo, to whaterver happends to tickle my fancy at the moment.
